name: domain_id
description: A unique key for each domain.

name: domain_name
description: The name describing the Domain, e.g. "Condition", "Procedure", "Measurement" etc.

name: domain_concept_id
description: A foreign key that refers to an identifier in the [CONCEPT](https://github.com/OHDSI/CommonDataModel/wiki/CONCEPT) table for the unique Domain Concept the Domain record belongs to.
